Helper functions to create and filter igraph objects

manage_igraph_object.Rmd

Managing igraph object

codexplor offering functions to manage igraph object. turn an edgelist into an igraph object, and filter it across the way.

Once you have a network such as a network of internal dependancies within a project (see get_text_network_from_project)

  • Turn your Citations Network into a directed igraph network with 

      netig <- codexplor::get_igraph_from_df(net)

  • Once you have an igraph object, zoom on a precise function with 

    filter_igraph_egonetwork(netig, "a_node")

  • Turn it into an interactive networkD3 dataviz with

  • And manage the interactive networkD3 dataviz with

Developed by Clément Laverdet.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.1.
